sentences.en: Both are awarded once in every three years at the plenary conference of the ISHEASTM.
sentences.cn: 颁奖仪式在每三年一届的国际东亚科学技术与医学史学会全体大会上举行.

sentences.en: Check internal affairs, watched drill, open summary plenary meeting.
sentences.cn: 检查完内务, 观看了操练, 就开总结大会.

sentences.en: Compere: You is this the a few th attend stationmaster plenary meeting?
sentences.cn: 主持人: 您这是第几次参加站长大会了?

sentences.en: He is a diplomat with plenary powers.
sentences.cn: 他是一位具有极权的外交家.

sentences.en: Jack: The IOC holds at least one plenary session every year.
sentences.cn: 杰克: 国际奥委会每年至少召开一次全体会议.

sentences.en: The conference ended with a plenary debate.
sentences.cn: 这次会议以一场全体辩论结束。

sentences.en: The organization holds entire county plenary meeting, before fighting personally, arouse.
sentences.cn: 组织召开全县大会, 亲自作战前动员.

sentences.en: The proposal was turned down at the plenary meeting of the committee.
sentences.cn: 在委员会全体会议上这个建议遭到拒绝.

sentences.en: The recent Eighth Plenary Session of the Thirteen Central Committee was a successful meeting.
sentences.cn: 这次十三届八中全会开得好.

sentences.en: The resolution was carried at the previous plenary session.
sentences.cn: 决议在上次全会上获得通过.

sentences.en: There'll be another plenary at the end of the afternoon after the workshop.
sentences.cn: 今天下午五六点钟在研讨会结束后还有一次全体会议。

sentences.en: These committees then submit proposals for approval to plenary meeting of the Assembly.
sentences.cn: 委员会向大会全体会议提交提案并由大会通过.

sentences.en: They will hold a plenary session next week.
sentences.cn: 下周他们将召开全体会议.

sentences.en: This association of trade of Spanish Chinese shoe establishs plenary session grander.
sentences.cn: 此次西班牙华人鞋业协会成立大会比较隆重.

sentences.en: We will hold a plenary meeting at 15:00.
sentences.cn: 下午三点我们将召开公司全体会议.

words.tran_cn: 充分地；完全地；有全权地
充分（表示情况、状态丰富）
全体会议；充满；充满物质的空间

trans.tran_cn: 全体出席的，无限的，完全的，绝对的
trans.tran_en: involving all the members of a committee, organization etc
